DESCRIPTION: Will be played without any cost when drawn. Draw 1 card.
#yFunnel attacks at the start of each turn. NL Whenever Energy is cost this turn, you may switch #yFunnel.
Sum of the upgrades of #yDimension #ySplitter: #yAria and the three #yFunnels.
You are rewarded upon completing tasks during combat.
#yPursuing #yFunnel will deal damage to #yPursued enemies at the start of the next turn and remove #Pursued status.
Bleeding creatures take additional damage equal to #yBleeding whenever Attacked this turn. NL It halves at the end of turn.
Whenever you end combat with #b10 or more #yHyperdimensional #yLinks, a random card will be upgraded.
Trigger the passive ability of your #yFunnel.
